=== Change distribution of the keyboard of "Spain" to "Latin American" ===

In the installation basic/default (Not Expert!) of Ubuntu Dapper Flight-3 in a Latin American country the distribution of the keyboard is not the correct one, selects the distribution of Spanish keyboard instead of the Latin American, for that reason the following errors have been reported.

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/malone/bugs/31235|#31235]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/malone/bugs/31332|#31332]]</nowiki>

In Notebook Compaq Presario V2417LA distribution of the keyboard is "Latin American" and in PC of Chile (Chile belongs to South America)

==== Solution in Server X - Change of distribution of the keyboard "Spain" to distribution of the keyboard "Latin American" ====

'''In /etc/X11/Xorg.conf'''

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Section "InputDevice"
| 
| 
| 
|-
| 
| Identifier
| "Generic Keyboard"
| 
|-
| 
| Driver
| "kbd"
| 
|-
| 
| Option
| "CoreKeyboard"
| 
|-
| 
| Option
| "XkbRules"
| "xorg"
|-
| 
| Option
| "XkbModel"
| "pc105"
|-
| 
| Option
| "XkbLayout"
| "es"
|-
| EndSection
| 
| 
| 
|}

'''Change:'''
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Option
| 
| "XkbLayout"
| ''"es"''
|}

'''To:'''
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Option
| 
| "XkbLayout"
| ''"latam"''
|}

=== Solution in Console - Change of distribution of the keyboard "Spain" to distribution of the keyboard "Latin American" ===

$sudo dpkg-reconfigure console-data

'''Select'''
* Aceptar
* Elegir mapa de teclado de la lista completa
* pc / qwerty / Latin American / Standard / Standard

Looking for keymap to install:
la-latin1

=== Notes: ===
* Is perfect in server xorg : -]
* Not is perfect in console : -[ working in report bug, bat is best distribution of the keyboard in "Spain" : -]
